title: (x) "Red, Red Blood" classic serif face - Bulmer, Caslon 540 {David H, Yves}
content:
What lovely classic font is this? Thx

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081013181656im_/http:/typophile.com/files/bdwn_7_6679.jpg)

 [‹ (x) Sheffield Wednesday logo Bauhaus sans - Horatio {Florian}](http://web.archive.org/web/20081013181656/http:/typophile.com/node/44010 "Go to previous forum topic") [Lion´s head Industries ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081013181656/http:/typophile.com/node/44001 "Go to next forum topic")
author: kidcranium

comments.content: that’s incredible. i don’t know what, though. :)
Could be Bulmer, though the ampersand isn’t

Heh. The ampersand is the classic [Caslon 540 Italic](http://web.archive.org/web/20081013181656/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/monotype/caslon_540_lt_std_italic_ot/?sample_text=%26%20&sample_size=144).
